name: Star Wars Jedi Knight 2: Lady Jedi
name_original: Star Wars Jedi Knight 2: Lady Jedi
description:
Star Wars Jedi Knight 2: Lady Jedi is an action-adventure game. It was originally released in 2004. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Star Wars Jedi Knight 2: Lady Jedi is available on PC.
